Unveiling the Future: Anticipating CES 2024
David Hernandez
With CES 2024 approaching, excitement is building for another impressive display of technological marvels. Reflecting on last yearâ€™s show, which boasted a 70% increase in size, featuring 2.2 million square feet of exhibits, and drew over 150,000 attendees, the event highlighted key trends in digital health, sustainability, and Web3 & Metaverse. As we look forward to CES 2024, we anticipate further insights into the future of technology.
CES 2024: "ALL TOGETHER. ALL ON."
The theme of CES 2024, "ALL TOGETHER. ALL ON.", emphasizes unity in advancing technology for the benefit of humanity. Walmart CEO Doug McMillon is set to be the keynote speaker, showcasing a collaborative effort between Walmart and CES, reflecting their shared commitment to enhancing retail environments and lives. Lâ€™OrÃ©al, a featured exhibitor, explores the fusion of beauty, technology, and advanced engineering in a podcast, emphasizing the importance of advanced chemistry for consumers to look and feel their best.
CES 2024, scheduled from January 9-12 in Las Vegas, is not just an event but a thriving innovation ecosystem with 130,000+ innovators and industry giants like AARP, Abbott, Amazon, Google, LG, Microsoft, and Sony. The recent announcement from the Consumer Technology AssociationÂ® (CTA) suggests a record-breaking event with over 3,500 exhibitors and an expected attendance of 130,000+, highlighting the thriving nature of CES.
Artificial Intelligence (AI): Transforming Industries
AI takes center stage once again, poised to redefine the business landscape. CES 2024 will showcase groundbreaking advancements in generative AI, machine learning algorithms, and AI-driven robotics. Enhanced Natural Language Processing will be a highlight, demonstrating how AI reshapes industries and revolutionizes business operations.
Green Innovations for Sustainability: A Collective Commitment
CES 2024 will shine a spotlight on the tech industry's commitment to combating climate change. Attendees can expect a wave of green innovations, spanning renewable energy, sustainable transport, and eco-friendly electronics. The emphasis on sustainability reflects a collective effort to create a greener, more environmentally conscious future.
Digital Health Technologies: Empowering Well-Being
Get ready for a transformative shift in healthcare. CES 2024 will showcase the latest in digital health technologies, from wearable devices to AI-driven diagnostics and virtual reality therapies. Technology is set to revolutionize the healthcare landscape, empowering individuals to take charge of their well-being.
Impact of 5G Technology: Unlocking Possibilities
The spotlight on 5G technology will explore its potential to reshape industries. With a focus on communication capabilities, 5G is poised to revolutionize connectivity, unlocking new possibilities. Mobile gaming enthusiasts can anticipate faster and more immersive gameplay experiences.
Evolution of Smart Home: Enhancing Daily Life
Building on the momentum from previous years, CES 2024 will once again be a hub for smart home advancements. Attendees can expect innovative solutions in security, audio-visual products, automation, accessibility, and user-friendly technologies. The focus on enhancing home office productivity and addressing modern parenting needs reflects the industryâ€™s commitment to making daily life more convenient and secure.
Security and A/V: Ensuring Peace of Mind
The enduring appeal of security and audio-visual (A/V) products remains a strong trend. With over 240 smart home solutions exhibited at CES 2023, CES 2024 is expected to continue this trajectory. Smart A/V products, acting as gateways for over half of smart home device owners, lead the market. The growing mainstream adoption of intelligent home security solutions, with a 10% growth since 2019, underscores consumersâ€™ desire for safety and peace of mind.

CES 2024: Panasonic Group to Exhibit Products, Technologies for Realizing Its Vision for Future Lifestyles
Las Vegas (January 8, 2024) - At CES 2024, the Panasonic Group will showcase technologies and products that build on the concept of “Create Today. Enrich Tomorrow.” Under the three categories of “Sustainable Energy,” “Circular Economy,” and “Resource Optimization,” Panasonic will introduce concrete facts that will help the Group realize its vision of the lifestyle of the future. The latest products and solutions for enhancing each person’s quality of life will also be exhibited.
As part of its long-term environmental vision, Panasonic GREEN IMPACT (https://holdings.panasonic/global/corporate/panasonic-green-impact.html) (PGI), Panasonic is taking an environmentally friendly approach to booth design. For example, Panasonic has incorporated joints made from high concentration cellulose fiber molding material “kinari” into its display tables; these tables will be used not only at CES, but at future exhibitions as well. Panasonic is also minimizing the use of building materials and carpeting.
Live Streaming the Panasonic Press Conference
The Panasonic CES 2024 press conference (Monday, January 8, 2024, 10:00-10:45 PST) will be streamed online at https://panasonic.com/CES.
Main Exhibits at LVCC:
Panasonic Booth Overview
CES Unveiled Las Vegas:
Shiftall Booth Overview
Panasonic CES 2024 Press Kits:https://na.panasonic.com/us/ces
Main Exhibition Booth Highlights:
The main presentation linked to the exhibition lineup will be shown in the theater at the entrance. Dioramas and representative examples will be placed in the center of each category to express Panasonic’s vision for that segment.
Panasonic GREEN IMPACT
Introduces “Panasonic GREEN IMPACT,” the Panasonic Group's commitment to achieving both a better life for people and a sustainable global environment. By reducing its carbon footprint, helping reduce emissions across society, and realizing a circular economy, the Group can ensure that its actions have impact.
Sustainable Energy
By promoting the diffusion of electrification from people’s homes to society, Panasonic will create a zero-CO2 society that does not require fossil fuels and that uses only renewable energy for social activities. These products and solutions will be introduced using projection mapping dioramas.
The Panasonic Group will introduce a wide range of in-vehicle device solutions that contribute to the adoption of EVs. The exhibit will use lights and touch panels to intuitively show how Panasonic’s products and technologies are used in various places throughout the car to solve environmental issues and contribute to the realization of a comfortable cabin while promoting safety and security.
Since Panasonic’s Air-to-Water Heat Pump collects and exchanges heat from ambient air; it is an environmentally friendly heating system that can reduce CO2 emissions compared to conventional combustion-type heating equipment that uses fossil fuels. It is also possible to remotely monitor the operating status of the system, and the Group has established a system that can respond quickly in the event of a problem. Panasonic first brought its lineup to the European market in 2008, and in May 2023, became the first Japanese manufacturer to introduce products that use the environmentally friendly natural refrigerant, R290.
Panasonic is developing high-performance electrodes for water electrolysis systems used in green hydrogen production. These electrodes feature a high-activity catalyst material made of nickel-iron layered double hydroxide (Ni-Fe LDH), which achieves high performance without using precious metals. Utilizing electrodes makes it possible to significantly enhance the performance of contemporary water electrolysis systems and substantially reduce the production cost of green hydrogen.
This is a concept exhibit for the central air conditioning system proposed by Panasonic. Compared to standard whole-house air conditioning, which pumps in air every time the interior temperature changes, a central air conditioning system constantly circulates air at the preferred temperature, ensuring uniformity throughout the structure. Ventilation technology also helps to provide a comfortable and clean air environment.
DERMS will leverage the latest IT capabilities to manage the generation and provision of locally sourced green energy to customers at their locations. It will also help counteract the inherent instability of renewable energy output by enhancing energy storage and delivery capabilities. Panasonic’s DERMS solutions will contribute to accelerating the implementation of renewable energy across society. The exhibit will also use panels and videos to introduce Panasonic’s efforts to ensure the safety of DERMS through monitoring and rapid detection of cyber-attacks. For now, Panasonic is expanding verification with electric power companies and transportation companies to accelerate verification of business scaling.
This renewable energy solution uses 5 kW pure hydrogen fuel cell generators, which can be connected in networks of up to 250 units depending on power demand and location. This solution combines these generators with photovoltaic generators and storage batteries for highly integrated control of power generation, adding a storage battery system to manage power supply and demand in accordance with fluctuations in power demand and renewable energy output due to weather conditions. The company plans to start PoC demonstrations at Panasonic bases in the UK, Germany in FY2025.
This solution is the first in the industry to support simultaneous charging and discharging of EVs and storage batteries. Integration with AiSEG2 improves self-consumption of photovoltaic power. Features automatic charging of EVs and storage batteries based on weather warnings, and industry-leading self-sustaining output during power outages, to support a near-normal lifestyle.
Panasonic aims to respond to customer needs by integrating solar power into unconventional spaces, such as windows and walls. PSCs represent a groundbreaking advancement in solar technology, offering a distinctive advantage in terms of their applicability. Unique material and industrial inkjet coating technology enables the creation of glass-integrated solar cells, allowing for customizable and versatile designs with high conversion efficiency. Perovskite solar modules of practical size (>800 cm2) have the world’s highest class conversion efficiency*1. With the potential to seamlessly incorporate solar power generation into glass structures, such as windows, walls, and facades, PSCs redefine the possibilities for renewable energy integration.
*1: Certified by Panasonic and an independent third party
Circular Economy
Minimizing the use of resources, extending the life of products, and accelerating circular lifestyles with low environmental impact through systems and services that keep customers connected for a long time. Panasonic’s future approach to consumer electronics manufacturing will be introduced through visual images.
Panasonic is proceeding with initiatives to reduce the use of resin (plastic) based on the characteristics of individual products.
With the goal of contributing to the circular economy, this exhibit and video presentation will introduce the technologies that make refurbishing feasible. Applying manufacturing knowledge and expertise cultivated over many years, Panasonic has the technology to recycle used products and the knowledge to ensure quality through inspections and performance tests. In Japan, Panasonic are now verifying recycled products for some of its TVs and washing machines to reduce the number of products that are discarded due to defects occurring during delivery and installation, and to establish a product circulation scheme.
Panasonic is building a system that closes the resource loop, from manufacturing to recycling to recycled resin, based on the concept of “From Product to Product”. By determining the characteristics of each recycled PP, PS, and ABS, the company has established techniques that use optimal formulations for resin parts, such as adding the group’s own antioxidants and blending recycled resin with new resin materials. This enables reproduction at a level suitable for home appliances.
Resource Optimization
Panasonic aims to reduce its global environmental impact and build a better relationship with the natural environment by optimizing the use of waste and carbon across the global organization.
A newly developed photosynthetic microorganism transforms atmospheric CO2 into plant growth-promoting molecules that stimulate crop photosynthesis-related metabolisms and enhance yields. The photosynthesis-based CO2 transformation processes address the world's growing need for foodstuffs while taking a circular approach to carbon neutrality.
Development of moldable (pellet-like) materials made from natural fibers extracted from plant resources such as thinned wood and waste wood mixed with resin.Like conventional resins, it can be molded, colored, and processed, and is expected to find applications in a variety of products.
Reduce food waste by raising awareness of local foods and building a system that allows local residents to appreciate their “good value.” In cooperation with local governments, the company will provide a food sharing service platform and subsidize the lending of kitchen waste disposal equipment to residents.
EAT WELL
Through a food culture tailored to the needs and tastes of each individual, Panasonic will help people adopt a healthy lifestyle.
As one of the leading  microwave brands with Inverter technology, Panasonic is constantly striving to make it easier for families to eat well. Panasonic and Fresco will collaborate to deliver a revolutionary cooking assistant for Panasonic’s multi-functional countertop ovens and will showcase this connected cooking experience in the booth.
FEEL WELL
Through easy daily self-care, Panasonic will help keep bodies healthy.
The Panasonic EH-NA0J hair dryer, equipped with nanoe™ MOISTURE+ and Mineral, provides moisture to the inside of the hair while mineral ions care for the cuticles, leading to a smooth finish that is resistant to damage. With continued use it can reduce friction damage from brushing, helping to achieve smooth and silky hair. This advanced technology, combined with its compact design, intelligent sensing, and various modes makes it an ideal tool for hair care.
The MULTISHAPE by Panasonic now delves into skincare and footcare with new attachments, offering exfoliating and cleansing brushes, in addition to a callus-removing footcare tool. Furthermore, Panasonic is also introducing new detail trimmer and hair clipper attachments. These new heads further expand the possibilities of the modular grooming system, which uses a single rechargeable base to reduce resource consumption by 60 percent. MULTISHAPE thus evolves into an all-encompassing, sustainable grooming device for diverse personal care routines.
The Panasonic ARC3 3-Blade Shaver, with inspiration drawn from the classic Star Wars™ trilogy is packed with cutting-edge technology and a premium stormtrooper-inspired design that mimics the iconic armor of a Star Wars stormtrooper. The ES-SWLT2W includes three advanced Japanese stainless-steel blades that are designed for use on all types of beard hair to provide a close and comfortable shave, even with everyday use.
Introducing the Palm Shaver by Panasonic: a luxurious, palm-sized shaver which redefines the shaving experience with its 70% smaller design compared to traditional shavers. This innovative device incorporates Panasonic's advanced 5-blade system and sensing technology for a closer, more intuitive shave. The use of NAGORI®, a sustainable material from sea minerals, in its construction not only helps reduces plastic consumption but also provides a unique, ceramic-like experience.
CONNECT WELL
Panasonic will help make spaces more comfortable with video and audio technology.
Panasonic's new flagship OLED TVs, Z95A and Z93A, come with Fire TV built in, offering a seamless blend of streaming, broadcast platforms, and smart home integration -- revolutionizing how you discover and enjoy content. The Z95A features a 65" and 55" Master OLED Ultimate panel module, while the Z93A offers a 77" Master OLED Pro Cinema size, both powered by the new HCX Pro AI Processor MKII for enhanced picture clarity and color accuracy. These TVs also set new standards in gaming with a 144Hz refresh rate, specialized game modes, and compatibility with the latest gaming technologies, making them ideal for both entertainment and gaming enthusiasts.
Go hard in your game. Not on your ears. Designed by gamers for gamers, the GNW10, from the SoundSlayer family of gaming audio products, delivers true-to-life sound that envelops you in the world of your games, music and cinema.
MOVE WELL
Panasonic Automotive unveils its collaboration with Infiniti to debut Klipsch Premier Audio System in the 2025 Infiniti QX80 Monograph to enhance audio luxury and performance.
A demonstration of Panasonic Automotive’s award-winning ELS STUDIO 3D® PREMIUM AUDIO reimagined for the Fisker Ocean One that blends best-in-class audio performance with sustainability-focused design. Neodymium magnet circuit designs are used to reduce the overall weight of each individual speaker by 30-60%. It is estimated that the ELS STUDIO 3D® PREMIUM AUDIO system draws up to 60% less energy than a typical audio system with similar acoustic output, which can potentially extend the vehicle driving range.
LUMIX S 100 mm F2.8 MACRO is the world’s smallest and lightest medium-telephoto fixed focal length macro lens*2. It is packed with Panasonic's cutting-edge technologies to achieve the exceptional compactness without any compromise in its performance.
*2: As of January 8, 2024. Among interchangeable lenses for AF compatible full-frame mirrorless cameras, and macro lenses with a magnification ratio of 1:1 with a focal length of 90 mm or more.
SL-1200GR2/SL-1210GR2 introduced in 1970 with the SP-10, Technics achieved a world first in turntable technology with its Direct Drive systems. Over more than half a century, this technology has continuously evolved, always striving for the pinnacle of analog record playback, honed with the latest advancements of each era. Now, with the development of the new generation "ΔΣ (Delta Sigma)-Drive" technology, which reduces minute rotational irregularities and micro-vibrations, the SL-1200GR2 represents a new frontier in sound. Combining Technics' expertise in low-noise power supply technology, the SL-1200GR2 marks a significant evolution, heralding a new era in audio excellence.
The SU-GX70 network audio amplifier allows you to enjoy superior sound quality from various sources, including the ever-expanding world of music and video streaming services, television, and analog records. Not only does it enhance the enjoyment of music, but it also brings the pleasure of experiencing television audio through high-quality components. Technics' renowned digital audio technology deepens the joy and emotion in your audio life, offering a richer and more immersive sound experience.
Legendary world-class audio. For high-quality listening, you need earphones that can keep up with your pace. Designed with your comfort in mind, Technics headphones give you superior sound wherever you are, whatever you’re doing. Technics helps you never miss a beat.
Panasonic has developed an ultra-fine mist technology called Silky Fine Mist. With an average particle size of 6-microns. Airbourne water particles are too small to cause wetness making it ideal for special effects, outdoor cooling, and humidification. This is made possible by emission via a pneumatic mist system, developed by Panasonic.
Shiftall (Metaverse Products)
The HaritoraX Wireless R is a new fully wireless full-body tracking device that adopts next-generation sensors and automatically corrects errors (drift) with cameras. Optical correction eliminates a negative aspect of IMU, i.e., drift, while still offering the benefits of light weight, small size, and long battery life.
HaritoraX Wireless is a fully wireless SteamVR compatible full-body tracking device for dives into the metaverse. Tiny, but it runs for 20 hours. Can be expanded to 11-point tracking with additional elbow sensors.
MeganeX superlight is a new model of a lightweight SteamVR-compatible VR headset, designed to be approx. 50% the weight of the original MeganeX. Extensive lightweight tuning has significantly improved comfort while preserving high-end picture quality with 5.2K HDR OLED panels. The new design omits Inside-Out cameras, speakers, and temples, and adopts an all-resin lens. Compatible with the SteamVR Base Station, enabling high-precision tracking.
MeganeX is an ultra-lightweight 6DoF-enabled SteamVR-supported VR headset with a 5.2K/10bit/HDR micro OLED display for a world-class visual experience. Supports Inside-Out camera-based tracking or Outside-In tracking using the SteamVR Base Station for highly accurate tracking.
This version is designed for shared use by multiple people in a business setting. For B2B applications, it is equipped with diopter adjustment, making it possible for people with different vision levels to use the same unit.The demo allows you to experience a 360° 11K VR video of Kyoto shot in high-definition HDR format.
FlipVR is a completely new style controller for VR that supports SteamVR Base Station. In the flipped state, it's possible to grab a drink, use a keyboard or mouse, or play an instrument in the real world without losing hand position tracking. Simply flipping it back returns it to its original state (same as standard controller).
mutalk 2 is a new model of the soundproof Bluetooth microphone that prevents voice leakage and ambient noise. This is an optimal device for use in video conferences, the metaverse, and online gaming. It features a new structure that prevents nasal-sounding voices. Offering high-quality audio with low latency when connected wirelessly through a dedicated communication dongle, it also supports wired connections (USB Audio).
CES 2024 Press Kit:
Please visit https://na.panasonic.com/us/ces for all Panasonic CES 2024 news announcements and photos
Media Contact:
Panasonic Operational Excellence Co., Ltd. Corporate PR Center Global PR OfficeEmail: journalist_online@ml.jp.panasonic.com
Panasonic Group Environmental Initiatives
The Panasonic Group has set forth its long-term environmental vision, "Panasonic GREEN IMPACT," with the aim of achieving both a better life and a sustainable global environment for all. Under PGI, Panasonic Group strives towards achieving virtually net zero CO2 emissions from its own operations by 2030, and will contribute an impact of more than 300 million tons (*1) of reduced and avoided CO2, which is equivalent to about 1 percent of the current global total of approximately 31.7 billion tons (*2) by 2050. The group also works on business activities to realize a circular economy in which resource efficiency contributes to decarbonization and reduces the consumption of limited natural resources.
*1: CO2 Emission factor based on 2020
*2: 31.7 billion tons of energy-derived CO2 emissions in 2020 (Source: IEA)
Panasonic GREEN IMPACT - Corporate Information - Panasonic Holdings (holdings.panasonic) (https://holdings.panasonic/global/corporate/panasonic-green-impact.html)
About the Panasonic Group
Founded in 1918, and today a global leader in developing innovative technologies and solutions for wide-ranging applications in the consumer electronics, housing, automotive, industry, communications, and energy sectors worldwide, the Panasonic Group switched to an operating company system on April 1, 2022 with Panasonic Holdings Corporation serving as a holding company and eight companies positioned under its umbrella. The Group reported consolidated net sales of 8,378.9 billion yen for the year ended March 31, 2023. To learn more about the Panasonic Group, please visit: https://holdings.panasonic/global/

About Sony Group
Sony at CES® 2024 - The World's Largest Technology EventPress conference to be streamed from 17:00 (PST) on January 8, 2024
December 15, 2023
Sony will be exhibiting at CES® 2024, the world's largest technology event, in Las Vegas from January 9, 2024. Sony first exhibited at CES in 1977, forty-six years ago, and since then, CES has remained an important venue for Sony to introduce its latest technologies and initiatives, as well as convey various messages to the world. At CES 2024, Sony will showcase various technologies and initiatives that support creators, based on Sony's purpose to "fill the world with emotion, through the power of creativity and technology."
"CES 2024" Sony Press Conference (online distribution)
Date and time: January 8, 2024, 5:00 p.m. PST
How to watch: Sony Square
We're sure you're curious about what will be announced at CES 2024, so for more information, please watch the live stream of the press conference on January 8th(PST). In this blog, we would like to look back on the history of Sony at CES.
What is CES?
CES, currently held in Las Vegas every January, originally started as a consumer electronics trade show under the name "Consumer Electronics Show." It is one of the world's largest technology trade shows and was first held in New York in 1967. It has since continued for more than 50 years, while undergoing various event frequency changes and taking place in a number of different host cities, including Chicago.
Sony and CES
Sony exhibited at CES for the first time in June 1977, at the Summer CES held in Chicago. The company newsletter at the time stated, "The CE Show is an event held twice each year, in winter and summer, and is equivalent to Japan's audio fairs and electronics shows, where we give `big demonstrations' of audio products at the venue." At the time, CES was more of a consumer electronics trade show, and for Sony it had a strong meaning as a place to unveil new products. For example, at the 1982 Summer CES, the Sony booth set up a "Future Corner" featuring a spaceship and exhibited the world's first CD player, which was about to be released at the time, as well as the innovative Mavica Prototype, which could record still images on floppy disks and was a precursor to the electric still camera.
Proposing renaming CES as the "Creative Entertainment Show" in 1990
In 1990, Akio Morita, then chairman of Sony, was the first Japanese person to provide the keynote speech at CES, an event where executives from leading companies give presentations. In his speech, Morita touched on the products that Sony had developed to date, emphasizing that the consumer electronics industry had entered an era in which new forms of entertainment were being created. He also cited the spread of movie video software and music CDs as an example, saying, "I leave it up to you whether you believe CES still means "Consumer Electronics Show". But by looking back at the past, and peeking over the horizon at the future, I believe the letters CES could be better read as, "Creative Entertainment Show." It is clear that the words "creative" and "entertainment" have been extremely important to Sony ever since then.
In 2019, about 30 years after Morita took the stage, current chairman and CEO Kenichiro Yoshida said, "Sony is a Creative Entertainment Company". He also stated, "Working with creators, Sony's professional grade technologies support creators across the entertainment industries to produce compelling content", which would form the foundation for Sony's current Identity.
Recently, CES has been increasing its presence as a place where the world's latest technologies can be experienced, not only those from electronics manufacturers but also the automotive, semiconductor and consumer goods manufacturers, as well as various startups. Sony has also gradually changed the approach of its exhibitions, contributing to the possibilities of entertainment and making CES one of the most important venues for introducing its latest technologies and initiatives that support creators. What kind of "future cutting-edge technology" do you think will be introduced this year?
Sony's press conference at "CES 2024" will be available to watch on Sony Group Official YouTube from January 8, 5:00 p.m. (PST), (archived viewing available). In addition, "Sony Square" will gradually release video content related to on-site exhibitions. Please look forward to it!
Introducing the Upcoming "Sony Creators Conference": Technology Conference for the Creative Community
Sony will hold the first-ever "Sony Creators Conference " in Los Angeles on Tuesday, August 8 and Wednesday, August 9 (local time). The event will feature talks and panel discussions by creators from across the Sony Group, including games, technology and film, as well as a keynote speech from Senior Executive Vice President and CTO Hiroaki Kitano. In this blog, we will introduce the main objectives of the event and the lineup of talk sessions that will also be made available online. We invite you to tune into the event for a glimpse into a future at the intersection of creativity and technology.
What are the growth narratives across Sony’s diverse businesses?The “Business Segment Meeting 2023” provides a platform for each business unit to share its story
On May 24th and 25th, Sony Group Corporation held its "Business Segment Meeting 2023“, where management from the Game & Network Services, Music, Pictures, Entertainment, Technology & Services, and Imaging & Sensing Solutions segments explained the growth stories of their business.
Contributing to Creativity through Management with a Long-term View, and Achieving Growth through Evolution of Diversity - Sony Corporate Strategy Meeting 2023 -
Sony held the "Corporate Strategy Meeting 2023" at its headquarters in Shinagawa, Tokyo on May 18. Kenichiro Yoshida, Chairman and CEO, spoke on the theme of "Contributing to Creativity through Management with a Long-term View, and Achieving Growth through Evolution of Diversity." In his presentation he provided an overview of Sony's businesses, which originated in sound and have expanded through management from a long-term perspective, and introduced a number of initiatives related to the pursuit of Kando centered on Sony's Purpose. President, COO and CFO Hiroki Totoki also took the stage and underlined how Sony aims to achieve further growth by continuing to evolve the diversity of its people and businesses, and explained the growth strategies for each business. In this blog we will share key points from the speeches at Sony's Corporate Strategy Meeting.

January 9, 2024
Sony Exhibits at CES® 2024
Showcasing its diverse initiatives and technologies that empower creators to turn their creative sparks into stories
Sony Group ("Sony") will exhibit at CES® 2024, taking place in Las Vegas, Nevada from Tuesday, Jan. 9 (PST), under the theme "Powering Creativity with Technology."
Kenichiro Yoshida, Chairman and CEO of Sony Group Corporation took the stage at Sony's press conference held on Monday, Jan. 8 ahead of the exhibition's public opening. He opened by stating that as a creative entertainment company, Sony has always placed people at the heart of creativity and has been committed to being a force for good by empowering creators. He was joined by a diverse array of presenters, and together they introduced initiatives to support creators across Sony's music, movies and television production businesses; new solutions for visual production and spatial content creation; fan engagement in communities such as anime, sports and games; and initiatives in entertainment and safety to advance the mobility space. The presentation also showcased the various technologies underpinning these initiatives. He closed the press conference by emphasizing that Sony embraces people's ideas and elevates their stories as it continues to power creativity with technology.
Press Conference speakers (In order of appearance)
Sony Booth Overview
Main Exhibits
From creation technology to fan engagement to expanding spaces for Kando, the exhibition will focus on how Sony is empowering creators to do more, explore more, and create more by providing innovative technologies for storytelling, entertainment, and beyond, and enabling new ways to fill the world with emotion.
Sony is also working to reduce the environmental impact of its exhibition, by reusing materials from last year and adopting a layout design that reduces the use of large-scale structures. Furthermore, the information panels within the booth are made of "Original Blended Material*," a paper material developed by Sony.
Expanding Creativity: Helping Deliver New Opportunities in Production through Innovative Technologies
Sony introduces Torchlight, a new groundbreaking advanced visualization space featuring the latest in proprietary technology from Sony Group companies in collaboration with Epic Games' Unreal Engine, the world's most open and advanced real-time 3D tool. Torchlight allows filmmakers to create digital scenes prior to principal photography, in a hands-on virtual environment using Unreal Engine and virtual cameras, including the Virtual Production Tool Set, which seamlessly links virtual environments with on-set production using Sony's digital cinema VENICE camera. In addition, creators will have access to various Sony proprietary technologies including the mobile motion capture system, "mocopi™". These technologies, and more, are incorporated into the workflow at Torchlight and support creators to unleash their creativity in real-time.
To further empower creators, Sony is supporting the growth of Virtual Production, a new form of content production, right from its technological development through to providing production solutions. In this field, Sony is combining advancements in its imaging, sensing, and display technologies, and leveraging real-time rendering using game engines. Pixomondo, Sony PCL and SPE are providing end-to-end creative services and stage infrastructure globally to cover the entire production process, from pre-production and on-set filming using Virtual Production, to post-production.
Fan Engagement: Enabling Cutting-Edge Experiences for Fans through Real and Virtual Integration
Sony Interactive Entertainment showcases the latest PlayStation 5 hardware lineup, featuring innovative products like the new PlayStation 5 console in a smaller form factor, PlayStation Portal™ remote player, Pulse Explore™ wireless earbuds, Access™ controller, and the upcoming Pulse Elite™ wireless headset. The Deep Earth Collection of stylish metallic PS5® console covers and DualSense® wireless controllers will also be on display. Attendees can also experience Gran Turismo 7® on both PS5 and PlayStation®VR2 (PS VR2) in immersive racing pods at the booth, as well as preview the brand-new No Return mode in Naughty Dog's The Last of Us™ Part II Remastered, which launches on Jan. 19.
Sony is advancing fan engagement initiatives in sports. Together with Manchester City Football Club, Sony is currently conducting a PoC (proof of concept) with the aim of providing new services that create a global online fan community. A beta service will be launched for fans later this year. Closed testing has already started, and fans were intrigued and excited about the project. At the booth, visitors can view new content from the Virtual Etihad Stadium, and engage in experiences to share their passion for the team and players.
Sony's sports businesses are exhibiting initiatives with multiple major sports properties across the globe, that bring together Hawk-Eye Innovations' optical tracking, Beyond Sports' data visualization technology and Pulselive's expertise in fan engagement to create never-before-seen fan experiences aimed at diverse audiences, including younger generations.
Sony Music is developing new opportunities for artists to expand their engagement with fans on gaming platforms and in other entertainment environments using game engine creation and virtual production technologies. Visitors to the booth can sample three applications of its next generation immersive music experiences. The exhibit will showcase how Sony's virtual production capabilities and Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) from Epic Games were used to create the music video for the song "Jericho" from Columbia Records artist Iniko, as well as Journey Through Jericho, a companion Fortnite island based on the video. Visitors to the booth will also be able to experience Nitewave, a new music-focused island for Fortnite built with UEFN. Additionally, they will be able to play AVNU: Where Music Meets, a music destination for Roblox centered around music-related gameplay, challenges and virtual goods collecting featuring music from Sony Music talent including Arista Records artist Paul Russell.
Sony Pictures Virtual Reality (SPVR) showcases their latest cross-platform, multi-player VR game, Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord, a world-building expansion of the beloved Ghostbusters universe. The exhibit will include eye-tracking and headset feedback of the PS VR2, the latest generation virtual reality headset for PS5, along with PS VR2 Sense controller adaptive triggers. SPVR expands SPE's use of IP by providing immersive entertainment through the production and distribution of VR games and experiences globally across all consumer channels, including in-home and location-based entertainment.
Immersive Storytelling: Creating Tangible, Visceral Experiences that expand IP in the Real World through Location-based Entertainment
In order to provide creators with new avenues for expression and expand the value of content IP, Sony is promoting PoCs for immersive experiences that utilize its sensing and interactive technologies through Group-wide collaboration. In this demonstration, visitors can experience the immersive world of Ghostbusters using Sony's unique haptics technology, marker-less motion capture, and the "mocopi™" mobile motion capture system.
In addition, SPE is focusing on location-based entertainment worldwide, including Thailand's Columbia Pictures Aquaverse which was chosen as one of CNN World's Best New Theme Parks. This exhibit introduces a video of these initiatives including the studio's first in-house operated immersive entertainment destination, Wonderverse, opening in the Chicago area this January.
New Creative Spaces: The Future is defined by More Spaces for Kando Moments - Mobility Transformed
"Safety Cocoon" is a concept to advance vehicle safety by detecting 360 degrees around the vehicle in various daily driving situations, allowing drivers to take early action to evade risk. At the booth, visitors can experience Sony's diverse sensing technologies that support the realization of this concept. By pursuing resolution and sensitivity that transcend the human eye, Sony's sensing technology aims to enhance safety by serving as the eyes of mobility, and contributing to delivering new mobility experiences.

results.title: ASUS Presents In Search of Incredible: Transcendence at CES 2024
results.content: LAS VEGAS, USA, January 9, 2024 — ASUS today unveiled its latest range of technological marvels, introduced cutting-edge products, and demonstrated its commitment to sustainability at the In Search of Incredible: Transcendence virtual launch event for CES® 2024.
results.raw_content:
ASUS Presents In Search of Incredible: Transcendence at CES 2024
LAS VEGAS, USA, January 9, 2024 —ASUS today unveiled its latest range of technological marvels, introduced cutting-edge products, and demonstrated its commitment to sustainability at the In Search of Incredible: Transcendence virtual launch event for CES® 2024.
New products include ASUS NUC mini-PCs, the result of the ASUS takeover of the Intel® NUC business. This range of small form-factor computers and barebone computer kits has been incorporated into this year’s lineup, which includes the NUC 14 Pro, NUC 14 Pro+, and other professional and gaming solutions.
ASUS also lifted the veil on several innovative products, including the revolutionary Zenbook Duo (2024), the world's first 14-inch dual-screen OLED laptop, and the ZenScreen Fold OLED, the world's first portable display with a folding OLED display. AI-powered laptops featuring the brand-new AI-enabled Intel Core™ Ultra or AMD Ryzen™ 8040 Series processors include ASUS Zenbook 14 OLED, ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED, and the all-new ASUS Vivobook S series.
In the world of augmented reality (AR), users can look forward to embarking on a visual revolution with the cutting-edge AirVision M1 AR glasses, a new innovation at the forefront of wearable AR displays.
A wide range of AI-ready commercial products was introduced including the ASUS NUC 14 Pro, which serves as a worthy successor to Intel’s NUC series and was engineered for unparalleled productivity and performance in a compact format. Featuring Intel Core Ultra processors, extensive connectivity, and versatile display options, the NUC 14 Pro series ensures seamless computing experiences in diverse work environments. Other business solutions newly designed to address customer’s pain points were the ultra-quiet ASUS Fanless Chromebox CF40 and the redesigned ASUS ExpertBook B5 and ASUS ExpertCenter D5, D7, and D9. The new ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus is our first ExpertBook series Chromebook, and also the world's first Intel Core Ultra-powered Chromebook Plus
For gamers, the new TUF Gaming A16 and F16 laptops were announced, as well as a major upgrade of the 2023 TUF Gaming A15 laptop. These laptops are equipped with the Intel Core HX or AMD 8000 series processors and GeForce RTX® 40 series Laptop GPUs. Also new to the TUF Gaming stable are the Z790-BTF WiFi and GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White graphics card, and the BTF White OC Edition motherboards.
Speaking at the event, ASUS Co-CEO S.Y. Hsu underscored the company's leading role in driving innovation. "This year we have not only continued our remarkable journey toward sustainability, but we have also leveraged our technological expertise in the field of AI and strategic alliances and partnerships, to create innovative solutions in the fields of consumer, commercial, gaming. With the dawning of a new age of AI-assisted technologies, ASUS is continuously striving to use this expertise and improve the user experience of every user.”
For those attending the event in Las Vegas, the on-site products featured during the virtual launch event, including those in the separate Republic of Gamers (ROG) CES virtual launch event, will be available for an exclusive hands-on experience at The Venetian Expo, Meeting Room #3102, from January 8 to January 11, 2024.
A commitment to quality and sustainability
ASUS will reinforce its commitment to quality and with its 2024 consumer and commercial laptops, subjecting them to rigorous MIL-STD 810H US military-grade testing for durability. This extensive testing reflects the company's dedication to providing long-lasting value and exceptional user experiences.
The launch event not only unveiled the company's latest technological innovations but also emphasized its unwavering commitment to sustainable practices. Under the theme In Search of Incredible: Transcendence, ASUS highlighted its robust ESG initiatives, integrating sustainability across products, operations, and carbon-offset services. ASUS aims for a net-zero enterprise, and the recent designation as an EPEAT Climate+ Champion serves as recognition of its initiatives and emphasizes a proactive stance in environmental stewardship. By setting ambitious near-term science-based emissions reduction targets, as validated by the esteemed SBTi, it also showcases its determination to mitigate climate impact. ASUS Carbon Partner Services, recently launched in Taiwan with ExpertBook B9403 and ExpertCenter D9, redefines business contributions to carbon neutrality, offering impactful solutions through verified and high-quality carbon-credits, and empowering customers to actively contribute to carbon neutrality.
The ASUS commitment to sustainability has earned global recognition, including acknowledgment by the Financial Times as a Climate Leader in Asia-Pacific and inclusion in the Corporate Knights Clean 200 Index. As a pioneer in sustainable technology, ASUS has a history of groundbreaking initiatives, such as the world's first carbon-neutral laptop, Bamboo-series laptops, and the recent launch of its first carbon-neutral verified business laptop in 2022.
The company actively incorporates recycled materials in manufacturing and packaging, utilizing over 1,600 tonnes of PCR plastic since 2017 and over 20,000 tonnes of recycled paper in 2022. ASUS's commitment to reducing environmental impact is evident in its recycling of over 40,000 tonnes of e-waste since 2019. The result is that revenue from eco-friendly products exceeded 87.2% of qualified revenue in 2022, highlighting continued progress towards a circular economy to minimize environmental impact.
Introducing AI-powered laptops and an expanded product portfolio
The recent strategic move by ASUS to acquire Intel's Next Unit of Computing (NUC) product line marks a pivotal moment in the company's ongoing expansion of its AI and IoT R&D capabilities. This acquisition positions ASUS to enter key markets, including industrial, commercial, and prosumer segments, solidifying its role as a leading technology solutions provider.
ASUS showcased an impressive lineup of innovative products, demonstrating the company's unwavering commitment to pushing conventional boundaries and delivering innovative technology solutions. AI-powered laptops feature the latest advancements in computing with Intel Core Ultra processors. These processors enable users to seamlessly manage complex workloads, enhance productivity, and benefit from advanced security measures. These devices represent more than just laptops; they signify a new era of intuitive and efficient computing designed to meet the diverse needs of modern consumers and professionals.
Emphasizing the transformative impact of its product portfolio, ASUS highlighted its dedication to delivering exceptional experiences that go beyond conventional constraints. The company envisions a future where intelligent, heartfelt, and joyful smart living is accessible to all, with a strong emphasis on sustainability, innovation, and user-centric design.
The event also underscored the company's integration of AI within its consumer and commercial laptop lineup, enabling users to achieve a seamless computing experience and an enhanced work-life balance. The incorporation of Intel Unison creates a unified platform, seamlessly connecting across different devices such as PCs, laptops, tablets and smartphones, facilitating effortless navigation and access to files and applications from any location.
The Intel Core Ultra Processor, equipped with an AI-focused Neural Processing Unit (NPU), serves as a powerhouse for accelerating AI workloads and running cloud-based AI programs, resulting in exceptional performance while prioritizing energy efficiency. This advancement contributes to prolonging the battery's lifespan, aligning with a more environmentally friendly approach.
With these cutting-edge technologies, users can anticipate faster content generation, simplified data analysis, streamlined multitasking, and enhanced security, ushering in an era of unprecedented computing capabilities and possibilities.
SHOWCASE: LAPTOP INNOVATION
ASUS Zenbook Duo (2024): Dual-screen innovation
The revolutionary Zenbook Duo (2024) is the world's first AI-powered 14-inch dual-screen laptop , equipped with two identical OLED touchscreens. With its detachable full-size Bluetooth® ASUS ErgoSense keyboard and touchpad, this incredible device has a user-centric design that rewrites the rule book for on-the-go versatility. This Intel Evo™ Edition laptop expertly combines multitasking versatility with superb mobility in a 1.35 kg-light
package.
The dual full-size 3K 120 Hz ASUS Lumina OLED 16:10 displays are joined by a lay-flat 180° hinge to instantly expand the visual workspace to up to a massive 19.8 inches, which thanks to the integrated kickstand and detachable keyboard can be used in vertical or horizontal orientations for several versatile user modes — Laptop, Dual Screen, Desktop or Sharing mode — controlled by the intuitive ASUS ScreenXpert software. The rechargeable keyboard can be detached to allow full use of the visual workspace or be placed on the lower display for a traditional clamshell laptop experience. Zenbook Duo (2024) maximizes productivity and play throughout the day with up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor with an integrated NPU for AI acceleration, 32 GB of LPDDR5x memory, up to a 2 TB PCIe® 4.0 SSD, a fast-charging and long-lifespan 75 Wh battery, and a Harman Kardon-certified Dolby Atmos® audio system. The NPU delivers low-latency AI computing, accelerating multitasking to make Zenbook Duo (2024) highly efficient for work, creativity or entertainment. And with the huge screen real estate, users can effortlessly run all their favorite productivity apps — and keep them in view — at the same time. Zenbook Duo (2024) is designed with sustainability and durability in mind. It incorporates a variety of recycled materials, and is durability tested to US MIL-STD-810H standards to maximize the device's lifespan.
ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED (N6506), ASUS Vivobook S series: Powerful, stylish and easy to use
Another highlight for the consumer segment is this year’s update for the ASUS Vivobook series, which encompasses an impressive lineup of the ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED and the ASUS Vivobook S series, offering exceptional performance and cutting-edge features for various user needs.
ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED offers seamless creativity and gaming with cutting-edge components: up to an Intel Core 9 Ultra processor with an integrated NPU AI engine, NVIDIA GeForce RTX® 4060 GPU with a low-latency MUX switch, 24 GB DDR5 RAM, and a 2 TB NVMe® SSD. It boasts advanced ASUS IceCool Pro cooling technology that enables up to a 125 W combined thermal design power (TDP).
The exceptional 16:9 display is a 3K 120 Hz ASUS Lumina OLED with vivid colors and a quick 0.2 ms response time. ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED includes many user-friendly features like the ASUS DialPad virtual rotary control, ASUS AiSense camera security features, and AI noise-cancelation technology for clearer conferencing audio. It also offers versatile connectivity and I/O via WiFi 6E, Thunderbolt™ 4, USB-C® and Type-A ports, and HDMI® 2.1. With the stylish and powerful ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED, creators and gamers can finally unleash their inner pro!
ASUS Vivobook S series laptops are sleek, powerful and lightweight 14-, 15- and 16-inch Intel Evo Edition laptops that offer the ultimate experience for those seeking on-the-go productivity and instant entertainment, with modern color options and minimalist, high-end aesthetics, making them the perfect choice for balanced mobility and performance. The Intel Evo Edition ASUS Vivobook S 14/15/16 (S5406 / S5506 / S5606) are powered by Intel Core Ultra processors, with up to a 45-watt TDP and a built-in Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that provides power-efficient acceleration for modern AI applications. The AMD versions, ASUS Vivobook S 14/15/16 OLED (M5406 / M5506 / M5606), are equipped with AMD Ryzen 8040 Series processors with AMD RDNA™ 3 graphics, boasting a TDP of up to 45 watts and built-in Ryzen AI acceleration for efficient performance in modern AI applications. All ASUS Vivobook S series laptops have a dedicated Copilot key, allowing users to effortlessly dive into Windows 11's AI-powered tools with just one press.
Lifelike visuals are provided by world-leading ASUS Lumina OLED displays with resolutions up to 3.2K (S5606 / M5606) along with 120 Hz refresh rates, a 100% DCI-P3 gamut and DisplayHDR™ True Black 600 certification. The stylish and comfortable ASUS ErgoSense keyboard now features customizable RGB backlighting, and there's an extra-large ErgoSense touchpad. As with all ASUS Vivobook models, the user experience is prioritized: there's a lay-flat 180° hinge, an IR camera with a physical shutter, a full complement of I/O ports, and immersive Dolby Atmos® audio from the powerful Harman Kardon-certified stereo speakers. These Vivobook models come prepared for extended charger-free days with their exceptionally long lasting and fast-charging batteries.
ASUS Zenbook 14 OLED (UX3405 / UM3406) is a premium ultraportable laptop powered by Intel or AMD processors. The Zenbook 14 OLED features the top-tier up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processor and Intel Arc™ graphics, or the latest AMD Ryzen 8040 Series processors with AMD RDNA 3 Graphics, depending on the version. Both processor platforms incorporate the latest advances in dedicated hardware AI acceleration, with built-in AI engines that optimize performance and power efficiency. Weighting a mere 1.2 kg and measuring just 14.9 mm thin, this sleek Zenbook 14 OLED is the ultimate ultraportable laptop that takes sophistication to a whole new level. Users can seize every moment using the enhanced extended-life 75 Wh battery and achieve seamless connectivity via all the essential I/O ports – including two Thunderbolt™ 4 (UX3405) or USB4® (UM3406), USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, HDMI® 2.1 (TMDS) and a 3.5 mm audio jack.
An immersive audiovisual experience is provided by the vivid 3K ASUS Lumina OLED 120 Hz display and powerful new super-linear speakers, and the user-friendly design incorporates convenient face login, an FHD IR camera with a physical shutter for privacy, and a new quiet ASUS ErgoSense keyboard with a large ErgoSense touchpad.
The new design offers improved sustainability with the extensive use of recycled materials for the laptop and its packaging, and US military-grade durability testing maximizes the device's service life.
DISPLAY INNOVATION
ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED (MQ17QH): The world’s first foldable OLED portable monitor
The ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH is a groundbreaking 17.3-inch QHD (2560 x 1920) foldable OLED monitor, that revolutionizes portable workspaces. As the world's first of its kind, it combines OLED brilliance with a transformative folding mechanism, redefining productivity on the go. The waterdrop-style hinge ensures a flawless fold, adding elegance to the design and facilitating seamless transitions between viewing angles. With a remarkably thin 9.7 mm profile (at its thinnest) when unfolded and a lightweight 1.2 kg chassis, this engineering marvel sets a new standard for portability and performance. The DisplayHDR True Black 500 display offers a visual feast with rich colors and stunning contrasts, maintaining true-to-life visuals through its 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and Delta-E 2 color accuracy. Versatile connectivity, including mini HDMI and dual USB-C ports, seamlessly integrates the ZenScreen Fold OLED into any digital ecosystem. Its standard tripod hole adapts to various setups, providing stability for work or creative endeavors. Users can experience the future of productivity with the ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED, a testament to innovation.
Revolutionize your vision: Unveiling the cutting-edge ASUS AirVision M1 AR experience
Users can embark on a visual revolution with our cutting-edge AirVision M1 AR glasses, the forefront of augmented reality eyewear. These AR glasses redefine the viewing experience, boasting an FHD (1920 x 1080) Micro OLED display with an impressive 1100 nits brightness, 58 pixels per degree, and an outstanding 95% DCI-P3 color gamut for unparalleled vividness and detail. Immersive viewing takes center stage as AirVision M1 offers a 57° vertical perspective field of view, coupled with a 38° Image field of view (FOV) and 60% transmittance. Empowering users with 3 Degrees of Freedom (3DoF) positioning and an intuitive app design, AirVision M1 allows users to pin the screen at a specific location, ensuring heightened control and comfort. AirVision M1 provides users with the ability to generate multiple virtual screens in 16:9, 21:9, and 32:9 formats, offering absolute versatility.
The glasses feature an intuitive touchpad on the left temple, facilitating seamless adjustments such as brightness control, 3D mode activation, and screen pinning. Connectivity is streamlined with the USB-C port supporting DisplayPort™ Alt Mode, ensuring compatibility across various devices. Prioritizing user well-being, AirVision M1 incorporates TUV-certified low blue-light and flicker reduction, along with noise-canceling microphones and speakers for an immersive audio experience. In a privacy-focused twist, these AR glasses distinguish themselves from others on the market by ensuring that content remains confidential. The actual user interface content stays invisible to outsiders, providing a private and secure viewing experience — a revolutionary stride in the future of augmented reality eyewear.
NETWORKING INNOVATION
ASUS ZenWiFi BQ16 Pro: Award winning mesh system for worry-free smart home
Another significant announcement was the debut of the ASUS ZenWiFi WiFi 7 mesh networking system, which delivers seamless roaming and exceptional performance for future-proof smart homes. Featuring WiFi 7 technology, including the new 320 MHz band and 4K-QAM data transmission, the ZenWiFi BQ series handles demanding tasks with speeds up to 30000 Mbps. The quad-band model future-proofs the network with WiFi 6E and WiFi 7 support, using a dedicated frequency band as wireless backhaul. WiFi 7 Multi-link Operation optimizes backhaul performance, combining three frequency channels, while AI-driven band switching maximizes network efficiency. ASUS AiMesh technology extends the mesh network effortlessly with compatible ASUS WiFi 7 routers.
The introduction of the Smart Home Master feature simplifies custom subnetwork setup and management through the ASUS router mobile app, offering IoT Networks, Kids WiFi, and VPN Networks. Users can manage IoT devices under one SSID, ensure secure online experiences for children with a dedicated Kid WiFi SSID, and connect to a VPN Network within a single tap. Furthermore, The ZenWiFi BQ16 Pro is a 10-gigabit network ready for the new broadband era and the ever-evolving connected home. The ASUS ZenWiFi BQ series provides a future-ready smart home mesh network, empowering users to redefine their digital lifestyle.
NUC LEADERSHIP
NUC 14 PRO: New name, same industry-leading power
ASUS is dedicated to advancing Intel's NUC legacy with the NUC 14 Pro series, representing a pinnacle of cutting-edge technology and performance. The new NUC 14 Pro and NUC 14 Pro+ models embody Intel NUC quality with a fresh perspective. The NUC 14 Pro features a 4x4 matte textured chassis with a replaceable lid, while the NUC 14 Pro+ introduces a new 5x4 chassis crafted from premium anodized aluminum. Compatible with Windows 11, Windows 11 IOT Enterprise, and various Linux distributions, the NUC 14 Pro models epitomize versatility, delivering a dynamic computing experience tailored to the user's needs. Powered by up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processors with speeds up to 5.1 GHz Turbo, integrated Intel Arc Graphics, and Intel vPro® Technology, these desktop powerhouses redefine computing within their compact size.
The NUC Pro models are the first to feature dual-channel DDR5 support up to 5600 MHz, a maximum memory capacity of up to 96 GB, and dual-channel NVMe x4 SSD support with a BIOS configured for adapter support. Offering a comprehensive array of ports and connectivity options, the NUC 14 Pro series ensures unparalleled connectivity, endurance, and a seamless computing experience. Display versatility is pushed to the limits with support for up to four extended displays through two HDMI 2.1 (TMDS)-compatible ports and two Thunderbolt 4 ports, depending on the SKU. With two SSD slots, lightning-fast data transfer, and expandable storage capabilities, these solutions cater to diverse digital needs.
The elimination of screws for storage installation streamlines integration, making it faster, easier, and safer. Featuring a robust yet sleek matte textured (Pro) or premium anodized aluminum (Pro+) chassis, a replaceable lid, and a VESA mounting plate, these small-form-factor desktops seamlessly integrate into any workspace, offering maximum functionality without compromising style. Individual unit packaging and a three-year limited warranty underline the ASUS commitment to productivity, seamlessly blending performance and sophistication. Depending on the model, users can choose to purchase only the board for upgrading existing computers, a kit without the operating system, or a complete mini-PC with the operating system.
CHROMEBOX FOR BUSINESS
Fanless Chromebox (CF40): Quiet efficiency, seamless reliability
The ASUS Fanless Chromebox CF40 is a revolutionary business solution designed for optimal performance and reliability in contemporary workplaces. Powered by the robust Intel Celeron® N4500 Processor and fortified with Intel UHD Graphics, it ensures seamless operation without disrupting the working environment. Its user-friendly design, featuring dual HDMI ports and USB-C support, effortlessly meets diverse connectivity needs, promising a hassle-free user experience. The Fanless Chromebox CF40 is specifically crafted to streamline workflows and enhance productivity, supported by simplified IT management and a secure, always up-to-date operating system.
Centralized cloud management via the Google Admin Console ensures smooth administration and effortless system maintenance, emphasizing the device's commitment to efficiency and security. With its innovative fanless design, the CF40 represents a significant advancement, enhancing durability and leveraging the full potential of Chrome Enterprise features. This makes it an ideal choice for prolonged usage scenarios, including digital signage and kiosk operations, offering businesses and organizations long-term, dependable solutions tailored to their specific needs.
RESPONSIBLE, AI-READY BUSINESS LAPTOP SOLUTIONS
ASUS ExpertBook B5 (B5404 / B5604): An AI-ready business laptop
Crafted to meet the evolving needs of modern business professionals in today's hybrid workplaces, ASUS presented the ExpertBook B5 — an AI-ready business laptop redefining portable performance standards that's available in 14-inch and 16-inch versions. At its core, ExpertBook B5 boasts the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, enhanced by three AI engines driving the next wave of business features, and improved AI-powered security. With options for NVIDIA GeForce RTX® 2050 graphics, dual SSD configuration, and a massive 64 GB dual SO-DIMM DDR5 RAM, the B5 is geared towards boosting productivity with improvements to everyday business workloads. Encased in an ultralight all-metal chassis weighing merely 1.29 kg for the 14-inch variant, the B5 is a meticulously designed solution marrying AI-accelerated performance with unparalleled portability. The magnesium-aluminum alloy design, tested to meet US MIL-STD military standards, signifies a commitment to durability. Connectivity has been improved with the inclusion of 4G LTE and WiFi 7 (CMA model only), ensuring a seamless experience for professionals on the move. ExpertBook B5 transcends conventional laptops by offering comprehensive I/O features, including a Thunderbolt 4 port and support for three 4K external displays, coupled with an RJ45 Ethernet port for office scenarios. A testament to versatility, the B5 features a convenient 180° lay-flat hinge and a 16:10 slim-bezel touchscreen compatible with an MPP 2.0 stylus. Elevating the user experience, it incorporates smart conferencing technologies like the ASUS AiSense IR camera system and AI noise-canceling, alongside options for ASUS Private View and a smart card reader. ExpertBook B5 empowers mobile professionals with multitasking confidence. Seamlessly integrating next-gen technology, it's the ultimate companion, encapsulating security, mobility, and lightning-fast connectivity in a sleek design.
ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus (CX5403): The world’s first AI-ready Chromebook Plus
The new ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus is a testament to innovation and sustainability, tailored for leaders and mid-level professionals embarking on a new era of computing excellence. This Chromebook stands as a pioneer in the Expert Series, powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra processors and boasting up to 16GB LPDDR5X RAM, 512GB storage, and WiFi 6E for seamless online and offline collaboration. More than a device, CX54 is a beacon of eco-conscious design, crafted with renewable energy and 30% PIR eco-friendly material. Weighing a mere 1.3 kg, its precision-crafted all-metal chassis is finished in elegant Fog Silver, showcasing premium aesthetics. Catering to the mobile workforce, CX54 features a captivating 14-inch 16:10 WQXGA NanoEdge display with 89% screen-to-body ratio and 100% DCI-P3 gamut. The immersive touch screen supports a USI stylus for creative endeavors. Connectivity is redefined with two Thunderbolt 4 ports, two USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports, and an HDMI 2.1 port, enabling professionals to sync up to three 4K monitors and additional devices, redefining Chromebook productivity. Equipped with an 8 MP camera and AI-empowered video tools, CX54 ensures confident presentations in any setting. Data security is enhanced with a fingerprint sensor, webcam privacy shield, Google Titan C2 Security chip, and enterprise-level management tools like Zero-Touch Enrollment and Google Admin Console — a reliable partner for IT managers. ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus isn't just a laptop; it's an elevated computing experience, seamlessly integrating performance, security, and mobility. It's the ultimate companion for professionals on their journey, whether on business travels, at home, or in the office, empowering excellence wherever they go.
ASUS ExpertCenter D5/D7/D9 Series: Business solutions for every need and situation.
The ASUS ExpertCenter D7 SFF (D700SER) and ASUS ExpertCenter D9 Mini Tower (D901MDR) are a testament to the marriage of aesthetics and functionality. With a sleek, ultra-compact design at 8.6L and 15.9L respectively, they enhance productivity without compromise. The smart design ethos permeates every aspect, from the compact dimensions to the latest Intel 14th Gen Raptor Lake Refresh S series processors and a full-sized NVIDIA RTX® 4060 graphics card, ensuring optimal efficiency for demanding workloads, striking a balance between aesthetics, adaptability and overall performance. But it's not just about power; it's about simplifying IT management. The ASUS Tool-Free Design, coupled with innovative internal placement and cable management, elevates efficiency and upgradeability, reducing the burden on IT professionals. Security takes center stage with optional TPM chips, Kensington lock slots, ASUS Pre-Deployment Service (APDS), and ASUS Endpoint Management Service (AEMS), fortifying businesses against data breaches. In a nod to environmental responsibility, these ExpertCenter desktops are crafted with eco-friendly PCR material, a new 500w TFX platinum PSU, and a smart fan, enhancing power efficiency. Tested against US MIL-STD 810H military standards, they ensure durability in any working environment. ASUS ExpertCenter Series desktops blend unparalleled performance, reliable security, and sustainability into a trustworthy computing solution. Born from the synergy of innovation and efficiency, these devices empower businesses to thrive in the ever-evolving digital landscape. The ASUS ExpertCenter Series isn't just a desktop; it's a narrative of progress, where smart design harmonizes with efficiency and sustainability, reshaping the future of commercial computing.
ASUS ACCESSORIES OFFER QUALITY-OF-LIFE IMPROVEMENTS AND UNBEATEN INNOVATION
ASUS has seamlessly integrated peripherals and accessories into its diverse product portfolio, showcasing the brand's commitment to delivering innovative technology. Recognizing the significance of these components as critical elements enhancing user experience, ASUS meticulously designs keyboards, mice, adapters, docks, and more. These products are crafted to seamlessly integrate into various digital environments, catering to the unique needs of users across industries. Grounded in a Design Thinking philosophy, ASUS prioritizes innovation to complement and elevate the functionality and convenience of everyday tasks. The brand consistently pushes boundaries, focusing on practical and creative ways to enhance the life and work experiences of customers.
ASUS Triple 4K Thunderbolt™ 4 Dock: The 12-in-1 solution for creators
The ASUS Triple 4K Thunderbolt™ 4 Dock is a comprehensive 12-in-1 solution that transforms workspaces. Featuring dual HDMI 2.1 ports, it supports multiple high-resolution displays, such as 8K at 60 Hz, two 4K monitors at 120 Hz, or three 4K monitors at 60 Hz. With data transfer speeds up to 40 Gbps and dual SD card support, it facilitates efficient file management. This versatile dock also offers 2.5 Gbps Ethernet for rapid networking and up to 100 W Smart Charging for device power. The sleek aluminum chassis — with an adjustable stand with a locking knob that allows it to be attached to a desk edge or the rear of a monitor — combines style with functionality, making it the ultimate companion for seamless multitasking and enhanced efficiency in any workstation setup.
ASUS TUF GAMING LAPTOPS, FOR THE ULTIMATE GAMING EXPERIENCE
ASUS TUF Gaming A16 FA607 and ASUS TUF Gaming F16 FX607: Delivering a reliable portable gaming experience to all gamers
The ASUS TUF Gaming F16 is an extraordinary gaming laptop designed for an immersive gaming experience, offering top-notch performance, military-grade toughness, and advanced display technology. Powered by the latest 14th Gen Intel Core i9 processor 14900HX and up to an NVIDIA RTX® 4070 GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, it handles demanding gaming tasks with ease and precision. Its AMD-powered counterpart, the ASUS TUF Gaming A16 FA607, features an AMD Ryzen 9 7845HX Processor and up to an NVIDIA RTX® 4070 Laptop GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, delivering exceptional performance for resource-intensive games. Built to MIL-STD-810H military-grade standards, both laptops ensure exceptional durability and reliability during intense gaming. The robust design includes 84-blade Arc Flow Fans and a dust filter for efficient heat dissipation, maintaining optimal performance during extended gaming sessions. The TUF Gaming F16 and A16 feature a stunning 16-inch display with a 16:10 aspect ratio and a high refresh rate of up to 165 Hz. With FHD or 2.5K IPS display options, gamers can enjoy crisp details, vibrant colors, and swift 3 ms response times, enhanced by NVIDIA G-SYNC® technology for a seamless gaming experience. The laptops offer a remarkable 90% screen-to-body ratio, providing an immersive visual journey.
The TUF Gaming A16 enhances the gaming experience with Hi-Res Audio and Dolby Atmos® technology, delivering rich, detailed sound quality. It includes a built-in HD camera for smooth communication during gameplay, a 2 TB PCIe 4.0 SSD for ample storage, and Thunderbolt 4 support for versatile connectivity options. Both laptops are designed for maximum performance, featuring dual-channel system memory DDR5-5600 MHz and up to 2 TB PCIe 4.0 SSD for smooth multitasking and rapid data processing. The ASUS TUF Gaming F16 and TUF Gaming A16 exemplify the ASUS commitment to delivering top-tier gaming experiences, surpassing expectations, and redefining portable gaming possibilities. Users can unleash their gaming potential wherever and whenever with these cutting-edge devices.
ASUS TUF Gaming F15/17 and A15/17 (FX507/707 and FA507/707): Powerful and resistant
The ASUS TUF Gaming F15/17 and A15/17 feature up to an Intel Core i9 processor 13900H (F15/17) or an AMD Ryzen 9 Zen 4 processor (A15/17) for seamless multitasking. Users can enjoy silky-smooth gameplay graphics with the latest GeForce RTX® 40 Series Laptop GPU, delivering high frame rates even at 1440p. The dedicated MUX switch and NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, along with AI-powered DLSS technology, ensure ultra-fluid motion and higher frame rates in supported titles. Next-level performance is provided by the MUX Switch featuring NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, allowing the laptop to bypass integrated graphics automatically during gaming for increased performance and reduced latency.
All 2024 models now include a MUX Switch for effortless upgrading of storage capacity with an empty M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen 4x4 SSD slot. For 2024, the improved cooling system features dual Arc Flow Fans with an 84-blade design, providing up to 13% more airflow than predecessors and quieter operation. This design also grants access to higher GPU power targets, offering gamers a competitive edge in performance. The ASUS TUF Gaming family, equipped with these enhancements, ensures gamers have every advantage in the gaming landscape of 2024.
TUF GAMING ADVANCED BTF ECOSYSTEM
ASUS TUF Gaming Z790-BTF WiFi, ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition graphics card and GT302 White Chassis: The future of gaming
Users can immerse themselves in the future of gaming with the latest additions to the ASUS Advanced BTF ecosystem unveiled at Computex 2023, a system of hidden connectors that enables tidier builds with fewer visible cables. Crafted for uncompromised performance, the new white TUF Gaming Z790-BTF WiFi sets new standards in terms of Advanced BTF design, and it’s also the first TUF Gaming white motherboard. Its high-power graphics card slot and enhanced M.2 heatsink deliver top-tier capabilities, complemented by the QLED with DRAM detection for seamless troubleshooting. Users can enjoy superior connectivity with the ASUS White WiFi Q-Antenna while experiencing a sleek and unified build thanks to its hidden-connector design, perfectly suited for the TUF Gaming GT302 White Chassis. This white motherboard harmonizes flawlessly with the TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition graphics card, forming a unified powerhouse without the need for external connections.
The TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition allows users to step into a new era of graphics cards. The new GPUs let them experience the outstanding features of the cards, which have been fully redesigned to form a core part of the BTF ecosystem. It stands as a testament to ASUS's commitment to innovation and is on showcase at the CES 2024 ASUS booth. Learn about ASUS Advanced BTF design at https://www.asus.com/content/btf-hidden-connector-design/
LATEST ASUS PROART CHASSIS AND ECOSYSTEM
The ProArt PA602 Chassis: Exceptional cooling performance and seamless PC building experience
Also on display at CES will be the latest ProArt chassis. Featuring an open-grille front panel with wide venting slots and two thick 200 mm ProArt front fans, this chassis ensures superior airflow with minimal noise. Dual air deflectors guide cooling air precisely, optimizing temperatures for critical components like the CPU, graphics card, and power circuitry. The ample interior space accommodates large components, including motherboards up to 12 inches long and 10.9 inches wide, and supports tower coolers up to 190 mm tall or liquid cooling with top radiator support up to 420 mm. Storage options abound, offering space for up to eight 2.5-inch SSDs or four 3.5-inch HDDs.
This chassis simplifies connectivity with a unified front I/O header and tool-free maintenance via side panels that unlock with a single key. Everyday usability is enhanced by the abundant front USB ports, including a rapid 20 Gbps USB-C port, and a physical latch for the power button to prevent accidental activation. Detachable dust filters on multiple panels and an intelligent LED indicator in the front ensure an optimal and dust-free environment. With a sleek, minimalist design, tempered glass side panel, and compatibility with other ProArt components, the chassis offers a sophisticated aesthetic that complements any workspace.
In addition to the existing ProArt motherboard, VGA, and display lineups, this year marks a significant expansion with the introduction of the ProArt chassis and ProArt AIO cooler. This comprehensive expansion now completes the ProArt ecosystem, providing users with a holistic range of components and peripherals that integrate seamlessly to offer a unified, optimized user experience.
